title: Darkwing Duck, Vol. 1: The Duck Knight Returns
description: It has been a year since Darkwing Duck has been seen in the city of St. Canard, the mighty metropolis the masked mallard had sworn to protect! The streets of St. Canard are crime-free, patrolled by the new robotic Crimebots of the Quackwerks Corporation. Whatever become of the self-styled Terror That Flaps In The Night? And when Quackerjack decides to "put the old band back together," will Drake Mallard answer the call of justice? Written by Aaron Sparrow and Ian Brill, with stunning artwork by modern duck master James Silvani, colors by DC Comics superstar Andrew Dalhouse, and Eisner and Harvey Award nominated letterer Deron Bennett, this is one collection not to be missed!
author: Ian Brill
